website_summaries.verdict: Minor quirks aside, this is an affordable Speed Champion set with 2 cars and 3 minifigures that make it an overall good value.
pros: Build 2 popular Porsche models with one mid-priced kit that also includes 3 minifigures
Comes with racing-themed accessories for hours of fun
cons: Small stickers can be frustrating to apply correctly
Boxes have been know to arrive damaged

customer_reviews.title: Does your kid love cars and LEGOs?
customer_reviews.text: The Good: - Finished product looks awesome - 6 year old put together by himself just needed help with stickers - Good value The Bad: - None The Bottom Line: This is a great set for kids that love cars. The set wasn’t too difficult for 6 year old. The only real thing he needed help with was the stickers. Overall I would rate this as a good value LEGO set!
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: We are making our collection, death race?
customer_reviews.text: My son and me like this series very much. We are making our collection of every single one of them. We are in progress to make the show room. Update: Have you ever seen “death race”? We made the modification.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old saved up her money and bought this set for herself. She loves it. For the price it has a surprisingly large amount of pieces and makes two whole cars. We have a lot of Legos in this house and this is one of the best sets we have gotten yet. (Perfect for my car loving girlie!)
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: A very happy 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: My youngest is getting into these Lego race cars. Santa brought him this two set and he was easily able to put it together (stickers too). He’s played with them daily since Christmas. I see more of these in my future.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Petrie

customer_reviews.title: Sets keep getting more and more detailed
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about these? You have to love the fun of building iconic cars out of Lego. Also, you can find these for good values from time to time, and two cars with minifigs for ~$35? Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: To me, the set is expensive. However, aren't legos always expensive?? My 10 year old, car obsessed son bought this with his birthday money and was super happy with the set. He was really impressed with the details in each build and said he would definitely buy again. Overall we're both happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids or the Porsche fan!
customer_reviews.text: A nice little play set for the Porsche fan or the kids who can’t ever get enough LEGO. The kit is easy to build and includes some cool special pieces to give the cars just the right look. The other included figures and accessories make this a fun play or display set. There’s enough to play with that it makes a good gift for someone who likes Porsche but is otherwise not too into LEGO or for kids who like creative and fun toys.
customer_reviews.author: LXXV

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Kit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I have been completing Lego Speed Champions for some time and enjoyed this kit. We really like the kits with two cars as she completes one as I do the other. Good bonding and she is inheriting my love of cars! The kit has the right amount of pieces. Not too many to feel overwhelmed and not too little to get bored. Both Porsches have good detail and the bricks hold well enough to play with afterwards. Nice additional to our collection!
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Price is right!
customer_reviews.text: Nice Porsche LEGO kit. Getting two cars is always better than getting one, and this kit does not disappoint. You get both old school and new school, and my son loves em. He got it for his birthday and had a blast building it. The price was spot on!
customer_reviews.author: J Fig

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality from Lego
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful great LEGO Quality. My 7 year old was able to build this set by himself and enjoyed every moment. 3 months later and he still has the set together and plays with the cars almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Another amusing addition to the Lego line
customer_reviews.text: For being such a compact model, they fit a lot of detail into these things. Every angle of it is thoughtfully designed to give the impression of the car on a tiny scale. It's a neat little showpiece, especially when combined with a few other Lego cars.
customer_reviews.author: thanby

customer_reviews.title: Oh man, the Porsche is so cool
customer_reviews.text: I'm more of a Technic Lego builder, but could not resist this kit. It's very cool, both RSR and Turbo are unique in their own ways. The RSR is my favorite Lego car in this series.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, excellent “models” for being pretty basic LEGO parts, my daughter loves it. Just take your time with the stickers.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lego Set!
customer_reviews.text: Probably my favorite Lego Speed Champions yet! Found it cheaper here than in store so couldn't beat it. Make sure you have tweezers to put the stickers on though.
customer_reviews.author: D.Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for my 7 year old!
customer_reviews.text: This set was easily put together by my seven year old. He really like the colors of the car and having 2 cars in one set is so fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Arrived in good condition and timely.
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t love Legos?! My teen son was thrilled with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Ethasp

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for the budding enthusiast in your life.
customer_reviews.text: It's Lego. I can count on one hand how many times they've done something wrong. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Beefmaster

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, kept the person entertained and fascinated with it. Definitely worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: LacrYmosa Wolford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I mean it's a Porsche Lego set. They look cool as all get out and my nephew loved it. He plays more with these than the 1400 piece castle set his parents got him. That's a win for Uncle
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of two cars to build
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons love this set. They were able to put tiger and have spent a lot of time playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Blount

customer_reviews.title: I don't love the price of Legos
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Legos...I don't love the price of Legos. Happy with the purchase because he is happy!
customer_reviews.author: MelanieW

customer_reviews.title: Great gift option
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an 8 year old and he loved it. He said one of the cars was a bit too challenging for him so his older brother helped him build it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lego for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: This Lego is for nephew 11th birthday. He was so delighted when he opened the gift such that he want to open the Lego box and started building.
customer_reviews.author: Nick9876

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just like the pictures show. About an hour build time for both cars. Came with a few extra pieces here and there. Great price for what you get compared to other kits.
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: These made a great gift for my nephew. He is a Lego Aficionado and he loved this set.
customer_reviews.author: amanda peterson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set! Realistic and fun build!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a great price. LEGO Speed Champions is an under appreciated theme! Fast build and scale appropriate. Hate the stickers but what can you do? Get it before it is retired and you have to pay double or triple on the secondary market!
customer_reviews.author: Have Fun SVO

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous... and fun to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled these with my 5 year old and they’re great. He doesn’t play with them on his own, but we do play with them together. Makes for great pretend play; impressive for car enthusiasts of all ages...
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice set you won't be upset
customer_reviews.text: Wow this set is awesome! I built it with my 7 year old son and he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but not a great value
customer_reviews.text: As much as I enjoyed building this set, I do not feel like it is a good value for the money. Almost $30 for about 45min worth of building.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my son

customer_reviews.title: Cool product.

It comes with a lot of stickers and they're a little annoying, not a deal breaker. The white one also comes with two different set of wheels.

customer_reviews.title: 2 Classy Porsche Models in 1 set! Well done!

product_meta.title: LEGO Speed Champions Porsche 911 RSR and 911 Turbo 3.0 75888 Building Kit (391 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Prepare for a modern vs. classic race with LEGO Speed Champions 75888 Porsche 911 RSR and 911 Turbo 3.0 cars, featuring minifigure cockpits, removable windshields and authentic design details. This building toy includes 3 minifigures, a lap counter, pit wall with a race-position board, and checkered flag elements to play out race scenarios.
feature_bullets: Build the Porsche 911 RSR and Porsche 911 Turbo 3.0 toy cars for kids, each featuring a minifigure cockpit with removable windshield and authentic design details!
Includes 3 race car driver minifigures with helmets, plus a buildable pit wall with a curb, fence, race-position board, checkered flag, and an adjustable lap counter

Porsche 911 RSR measures over 1” (5cm) high, 6” (17cm) long and 2” (6cm) wide Porsche 911 Turbo 3.0 measures over 1” (4cm) high, 5” (15cm) long and 2” (6cm) wide Pit wall measures over 3” (8cm) high, 6” (17cm) wide and 3” (8cm) deep Lap counter measures over 1” (3cm) high, 1” (3cm) wide and under 1” (1cm) deep
391 pieces – Porsche toy car building set for boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 14
LEGO Speed Champions playsets are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars974 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
